message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the purchase of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. With that said, I'm willing to offer you the product for $1100000. This is a competitive price considering the product's value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to consider the product's value to me as well. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $1050000. This is a fair compromise that still benefits both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $1050000. This is the minimum price I'm willing to accept for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to prioritize my own interests. I'm offering you the product for $1025000. This is my final counteroffer.
